transcript:
Customer: Mere tan man dhadkan mein bhiya Ram Ram hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Very good afternoon. Anshika Insta Tech mein baat ho rahi hai sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Main Ankita baat kar rahi hu sir Indiamart team se, Noida head office se. Indiamart pe aapka business platform registered hai sir. Sir actually maine call kiya hai aapka ek feedback receive hua tha hamare paas.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir aapne ye feedback diya tha ki aapko irrelevant lead aa rahi hai aur lower value ki lead aa rahi hai. So batayenge ki sir jaise
Customer: Haan boliye.
Customer: Mujhe jo lead aati hai usme to lagbhag 80% lead hoti hai job profile ke liye matlab logo ko job chahiye uske liye call karte hain. Ki hai aapke paas job hai ki nahi uske liye aur dusri baat ki jo hamari leads aati hai wo matlab hamari jaise category criteria hai ki minimum 5000 square feet ke upar hi kaam karna hai to uske chhote chhote wo hamare lead matlab kaam ki nahi hai wo jyada aati hai.
Executive: Sir abhi jo aapne lead consume ki hai main dekh rahi hu ek 27000 square feet ki lead consume ki hai aapne. Haan theek hai. Business users ki bhi thi to
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Bataye.
Customer: Isiliye maine kaha na 80% lead aisi aati hai. 20% to aati hai kaam ki ye nahi keh raha hu but 80% lead sahi nahi aati hai.
Executive: Sir past maine jo aath lead abhi dekhi hai usme aapko 5000 square feet ki upar ki lead aapne consume ki hai. Aur sir online platform pe mixed kind of lead to aati hi hai aapko filter use karna rahega. Aap jis tarike se isme filter apply karenge ki aapko 50000 se upar ki chahiye ya 1 lakh se upar ki order value chahiye leads dikhengi. To I hope aap filter to use kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Sir filter use karte hain matlab jo hamare paas calls aate hain wo fake calls rehte hain matlab.
Executive: Sir kya matlab hai sir? Call aur inquiry mein pata hai kya antar hota hai? Jaise buylead to hum verify karte hain ki buyer ki actual mein kya requirement hai fir wo hum post karte hain aapke buylead ke section pe. Call aur inquiry totally buyer dependent hai. Buyer dependent matlab buyer ne aapki category ko search kiya somehow usko aapki company jyada relevant lagi sahi lagi at the basis of ki purana platform hai aapka reviews acche hain to unhone direct call kiya. To waha pe hum aisa koi track nahi laga sakte ki haan ek person call kare dusra person call na kare. To hum aapke profile pe depend jo call aa rahi hai wo direct buyer ke end se aa rahi hai. Waha pe aap ye kar sakte hain ki minimum order quantity mention kar sakte hain har ek product aur services pe. Ki aapko itna minimum order quantity chahiye rehta hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Wo minimum order quantity.
Customer: Theek hai ji ye bhi karenge.
Customer: Actually kya hai ki main thoda drive kar raha hu to thoda baat karne mein utna comfortable nahi hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aapke paas mera number ye mera number aap save kar sakte hain with name of Ankita aur main chahungi ki agar aap kal ka kisi samay ka video meeting ka time de to main aapko kuch cheeze aur bhi guide kar paungi jisme aapko service mein help hoga.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai main kal aapko call karke ek baar time arrange karunga ki kitne baje time available rahunga aap video meeting kar lenge uske time.
Executive: Theek hai. Abhi jo aapka mail aa rakha tha kya main ye mail close karu kal main isi number se recorded call pe baat karu aapka?
Customer: Haan theek hai kal aap mere se baat kariyega.
Executive: To main mail se close kar sakti hu jo aapne mail id se book kiya tha hame?
Customer: Sir wo ek baar dekhna padega kya hai fir main uske baad bataunga. Aap kal baat ek baar kal baat karke fir aap close kariyega. That will be better rahega.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai theek hai chaliye okay sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving irrelevant and lower value leads.

- Most leads are for job profiles.

- Leads received are not meeting minimum square feet criteria.



Resolution:

- Explained the difference between call and inquiry.

- Suggested to mention minimum order quantity.

- Offered a video meeting for further guidance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will receive a call to schedule video meeting.

- Customer will check the mail and inform executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, order quantity, video meeting
